about_the_game:
FEIST's haunting original soundtrack by Tomek Kolczynski includes 13 epic ambient tracks.

1. After a Long Night (4:06)
2. A Picnic (7:10)
3. Tools of the Woods (7:55)
4. Down by the Lake (9:02)
5. A Bad Hair Day (10:12)
6. Dwellers in the Dark (6:22)
7. Trespassing (7:06)
8. All Good Comes from Above (3:26)
9. Ruins of the Past (13:27)
10. Playing with Fire (12:23)
11. Outro (3:08)
12. Before And After (3:24)
13. In the Trees (7:30)
